title: Centered Subjects That Work
description: A fast breakdown of Centered Subjects That Work for builders.

hook.text: The rule of thirds says don't center. But some of the most powerful photos put the subject dead center.

buildup.text: Centered compositions create symmetry, confrontation, and a sense of deliberate formality.

discovery.text: Portraits staring directly at the camera from the center are arresting. They demand the viewer's attention.
